name: Overview

[{"id":"61660439-f403-492a-b265-e16ff15173fa","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: get_module_ns","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ea1614b0-83de-488b-a846-50afc6aaca33","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_module_ns","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is a structural lookup utility that identifies the parent module for any given namespace. Given a deeply nested identifier (like a method inside a class inside a function), this function climbs up the namespace hierarchy until it finds the definition marked as a Module (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"MOD_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3c9ace56-d5c8-463e-b034-bf87b82e6327","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"In complex projects, the analyzer often works with long, fully qualified names such as ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"project.utils.network.request_handler.post","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". To perform many operations—like resolving relative imports or finding file paths—the analyzer needs to know which file (module) this specific code actually belongs to. This function provides that "root" module context.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"92a7e92f-e788-4611-bc59-0a517aeca0a9","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b1bd48f0-0af1-4e66-8a72-614a3bcf1f6c","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Iterative Traversal:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It takes a namespace string (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"pkg.mod.Class.method","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f9945e26-c01f-4b40-a6f8-35282e096d46","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Parent Search:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It enters a loop that repeatedly strips the last part of the namespace (the part after the last dot).","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"5f554f46-df35-44c7-bfa6-721c3040e10c","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"pkg.mod.Class.method","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" → ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"pkg.mod","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"cdafed67-748b-4a5a-b2be-6f0de9321aec","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Type Validation:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" At each step, it checks the Definition Manager to see if the current string corresponds to a Module definition (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"MOD_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"87d36b75-f9df-4df1-b9e8-747cd43d98eb","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Termination:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" The process stops as soon as a module is identified or the string becomes empty. It returns the name of the found module (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"pkg.mod","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"17063dac-ed7b-44fc-8cce-f94991bc1ccc","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"If the analyzer is currently processing a line inside ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"my_app.services.auth.verify_token","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":":","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9ba91b4a-efbe-40e6-930d-c95d1c50f902","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"get_module_ns("my_app.services.auth.verify_token")","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is called.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"71c69a12-8d50-415f-835e-1b9c82a97ca4","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It checks ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"my_app.services.auth.verify_token","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (Function - No).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"db703832-c24a-481c-9524-83ab02881f87","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It checks ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"my_app.services.auth","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (Module - ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Yes!","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2d835b1f-da21-43b2-b189-87ddeb0c1b54","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The function returns ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"my_app.services.auth","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Now the analyzer knows to look for file-level resources in the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"auth.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" file.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c9256ca9-3006-4b84-a56a-7945c5f1f401","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
